mapper.update: update wallet set wal_type = #{walType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wal_password = #{walPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wal_balance = #{walBalance,jdbcType=REAL}, wal_pay_id = #{walPayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wal_email = #{walEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where wal_id = #{walId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select wal_id, wal_type, wal_password, wal_balance, wal_pay_id, wal_email from wallet
